column2: 45-54 Female  on Treatment for 2 to less than 5 years (Patient)
column9: I take this along with Oxycontin, Oxycodone, Neurintin for severe lower and cervical spine problems, I spoke with my doctor because it didn't work as good as the Valume 5mg I took when I was in the ER after a procedure went bad. I'm just about to start taking 2 750mg 3 times a day instead of only one, I will have to see if this works, I will post another post in a month. I read alot of comments about people with chronic pain NOT getting the pain pill they desperately need to function, please go to a Pain Management Doctor, they deal in ONLY Pain, unlike your PCP. PCP really can't prescribe strong pain medication because they are not specialist in pain, the DEA is very strict. For depression you see a specialist, for pain you too must see a specialist in Pain Management. I don't know why PCP don't refer patients with chronic pain to Pain Management Specialist? Go Figure
